channel.title: Comments for MyHeroWallet
channel.description: Decentralized Gamified Wallet - Trade, Stake, Farm and earn $MYWA token

item.title: Comment on Witaj, świecie! by Komentator WordPress
item.dc:creator: Komentator WordPress
item.description: Cześć, to jest komentarz. Aby zapoznać się z moderowaniem, edycją i usuwaniem komentarzy, należy odwiedzić ekran Komentarze w kokpicie. Awatary komentujących pochodzą z <a href="https://pl.gravatar.com">Gravatara</a>.
item.content:encoded:
Cześć, to jest komentarz.
Aby zapoznać się z moderowaniem, edycją i usuwaniem komentarzy, należy odwiedzić ekran Komentarze w kokpicie.
Awatary komentujących pochodzą z Gravatara.

item.title: Comment on Why Cambridge Analytica Need ICO? by Marta Simons
item.dc:creator: Marta Simons
item.description: The adoption of support for Payment Protocol wallets has made a big difference for our merchants. Merchants are now able to easily accept Bitcoin payments in a simple easy way without any support issues.
item.content:encoded: The adoption of support for Payment Protocol wallets has made a big difference for our merchants. Merchants are now able to easily accept Bitcoin payments in a simple easy way without any support issues.

item.title: Comment on Why Cambridge Analytica Need ICO? by Marta Simons
item.dc:creator: Marta Simons
item.description: As our company has processed over a $1 Billion a second year in a row despite Bitcoin's large price drop shows that Bitcoin is being used to solve real pain points around the world.
item.content:encoded: As our company has processed over a $1 Billion a second year in a row despite Bitcoin’s large price drop shows that Bitcoin is being used to solve real pain points around the world.

item.title: Comment on Facts & Tips About Bitcoin Miner Fees by Marta Simons
item.dc:creator: Marta Simons
item.description: Using WallApp to accept blockchain payments provides our clients a degree of comfort by having a strong AML/ATF compliance program.
item.content:encoded: Using WallApp to accept blockchain payments provides our clients a degree of comfort by having a strong AML/ATF compliance program.
